casebody.data:
CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2005. Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for NW Sign Industries, et al. Jared E. Gardner, Charlotte, for Capps.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of August 2005 by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (NW Sign industries, et al.) shall have up to and including the 17th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2005."
